ingredients.item: 125g can essential Waitrose Mackerel Fillets In Spicy Tomato Sauce

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200Â°C, gas mark 6.
Prick the skin of the sweet potato with a fork
and microwave on high for 4 minutes. Transfer to the oven and bake for 10 minutes or until tender. Place on a plate and split open.
Place the spinach in a bowl and microwave for 1-2 minutes until just wilted, squeeze out the excess liquid and place on top of the potato.
Warm the mackerel fillets and sauce in a small bowl in the microwave for 1 minute and spoon over the potato. Serve with a dollop of yogurt and a drizzle of olive oil.
